homepage.title: Empower Your Craft with AI
homepage.subtitle: Artisan provides intelligent tools to help you describe, narrate, and sell your unique creations. Focus on your art, we'll handle the words. The platform is completely free for artisans.
homepage.features_subtitle: From image to story, our AI is trained to showcase the soul of your work.
homepage.feature_1_desc: Upload a photo and get a compelling description and tags instantly.
homepage.feature_2_desc: Tell your story, and our AI will refine it into a captivating narrative.
homepage.feature_3_desc: Get insights on how customers are interacting with your products.
homepage.feature_4_desc: Generate promotional materials and understand market demand for your art.
homepage.art_title: Contemporary Indian Art for the Next Generation
homepage.art_subtitle: Discover modern Indian artists who are redefining tradition with a fresh, vibrant perspective.
homepage.art_1_desc: Ancient tales retold through digital illustration, blending epic narratives with modern aesthetics.
homepage.art_2_desc: Graffiti and stencil art infused with Indian motifs, creating bold statements on urban canvases.
homepage.art_3_desc: Traditional folk forms like Warli and Gond, reimagined with clean lines and a contemporary color palette.
homepage.payments_subtitle: We support a wide range of payment methods to make receiving payments for your art seamless. All transactions are secure and compliant with Indian regulations.
homepage.payments_extra: ...and many more UPI, credit, and debit card options.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions.

items.question: Is the Artisan platform free to use?
items.answer: Yes, the platform is completely free for artisans. We do not charge any commission or fees on your sales.

items.question: How do I get paid for my sales?
items.answer: You can set up your payment preferences in the 'Payment Settings' section of your dashboard. We support payouts via UPI and direct bank transfer.

items.question: How do the AI tools work?
items.answer: Our AI tools are designed to be simple. For example, to generate a description, just upload a product image and click 'Generate'. The AI analyzes the image and creates a description and tags for you. You can then edit the text as you wish.

items.question: Can I interact with other artists?
items.answer: Yes! The 'Community Hub' is a place for you to connect with other artisans on the platform, share ideas, and collaborate.

items.question: Why do I need to verify my account to go live?
items.answer: We require verification for live streaming to ensure a safe and trusted environment for all users, including artists and learners. It helps prevent misuse and maintains the integrity of the platform.
